title: Campuhan Ridge Walk & Ubud Sights (Half-day)
overview: A relaxing half-day trek along the scenic Campuhan Ridge, with time to explore Ubud’s highlights.

stops.description: Enjoy a gentle hike along the ridge with panoramic valley views.
Stop for coffee or juice at a local café in Ubud.
Browse for local crafts and souvenirs.

title: Ubud Nature & Culture Day (Full-day)
overview: A full day exploring Ubud’s natural beauty and culture, including the Campuhan Ridge Walk, Monkey Forest, and temples.

stops.description: Hike the scenic ridge and enjoy the views.
Visit the Sacred Monkey Forest Sanctuary.
